title: News: Stream Youth Lagoon's new album on NPR
body:
**Youth Lagoon’s **sophomore album **_Wondrous Bughouse _**isn’t due out on Fat Possum until March 5th – but after already letting us hear tracks ‘Dropla’ and ‘Mute’, Trevor Powers has now kindly made the whole record available to stream, via National Public Radio.

Click [here to listen](http://www.npr.org/2013/02/24/172611335/first-listen-youth-lagoon-wondrous-bughouse?sc=tw&cc=twmp "First listen - Wondrous Bughouse").

excerpt.full: Youth Lagoon’s sophomore album Wondrous Bughouse isn’t due out on Fat Possum until March 5th – but after already letting us hear tracks ‘Dropla’ and ‘Mute’, Trevor Powers has now kindly made the whole record available to stream, via National Public Radio. Click here to listen.
excerpt.short: Youth Lagoon's sophomore album Wondrous Bughouse isn't due out on Fat Possum until March...
